Some Data Analysis about Congress

Does the president’s party always lose seats in congress?

elections
Analyzes historical data on how the sitting president’s party performs in congressional elections. Uses pandas for data wrangling and visualization to explore partisan patterns over time.
Published

June 6, 2023

import pandas as pd
tbl = pd.read_html("https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/statistics/data/seats-congress-gainedlost-the-presidents-party-mid-term-elections")
df = tbl[0]
df.columns = df.columns.to_flat_index()
df
